lines.text: Oh, now this makes me sick. Woman gets four million dollars for spilling coffee on herself. I do that every morning, what do I get? Coffee stains.
They were having an affair?
No, they were celebrating Earth Day, you fucking mook.
Why are you so cynical?
Because someone killed Bambi's mother.
[Of a locker]
Keep it clean. Don't let anyone else near it. It's kind of like your dick.

[of a woman murdered while jogging]
At least she died healthy.
What the Hell's wrong with you?
I'm just tired of people shirking responsibility for their actions.
The world is shit, people are bad, we're all gonna die, deal with it.
Either the world's right side up or upside down, it depends on how you look at it. I mean, close the book of rules and there's just people caught in situations - like you and me.
Girl's got a good right hook.
I hate funerals. They're an undeniable reminder of man's mortality...
Are you gay?
No. No, I'm not gay.
Just curious...
Why'd you ask me if I was gay?
No reason.
Then why'd you ask?
Let's get lunch. Ya hungry?
What makes you think I'm gay?
What are ya in the mood for? Tacos? Burgers? Quiche?
Look for the needle in the shit pile.
At least he used a clean needle.
I can't imagine how terrified she must have been.
I can... I was married to a dentist.
If you're insinuating that a person can't be spiritual and still...
Relax, John Paul. If we're gonna work together we're gonna have to let a little more shit roll off our backs.
[about Sandra]
I don't like it. I don't trust anyone over ten who listens to the Sound of Music.
Phew. Rough day, huh?
Don't even think about fucking me over...
I don't even know why do you keep doing this stuff, working on church...
I like to do good actions, to help. Besides there's a lot of stuff to do, now that Ben is dead.
Sandra, we killed Ben...
So...? Why does Reverend Finlayson has to suffer?

[to Sergeant Rita Pompano]
I thought it was an accident. Why are you asking me all these weird questions?

[to Rollins]
Are my questions weird, Detective Rollins?

[to Peggy]
Rude, maybe, but not weird.
Do you wanted to kill yourself?

[faking cry]
Sort of...

[also faking cry]
Jake's through a hard time lately...
Yes... I'm a... I'm an alcoholic.
Hey! Welcome to the club.
Jake... get the hell out!
